_header: Earth maked hall / and earth maked bower
_description: A variant of ‘Erthe upon Erthe’, A-version — four quatrains in John Grimestone’s sermon notes.

NLS18721.First Lines: Herde maket halle& herde maket bour…
NLS18721.Last Lines: …Þan sal herde bewepenÞat he eer below
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 27.
